definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: Various initiatives continue to be implemented to reduce the risk of landslides.
sentences.chinese: 當局繼續推行各項新措施，以減低山泥傾瀉的風險。

sentences.english: The current  occurrence of  torrent  spurs him to buy fur and  sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 現行的傾瀉事件驅使他買毛皮衣服和硫磺。

sentences.english: The downpour quickly ran off the barren hills and began building up in the narrow valley.
sentences.chinese: 傾瀉的暴雨很快衝光貧瘠的山泥，小峽谷開始顯現。

sentences.english: To carry out landslip preventive works which include earthworks for slopes within country park.
sentences.chinese: 在郊野公園內進行防止山泥傾瀉工程，包括土木工事。

sentences.english: I felt golden ideas pouring from the dark blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我感受到金光閃閃的點子從深藍色的夜幕傾瀉而下。

sentences.english: It caving in to people indiscriminately mercilessly.
sentences.chinese: 它向人們肆意地傾瀉無情。

sentences.english: It pours out of the radio all day.
sentences.chinese: 人們每天都會通過電波傾瀉自己的不滿。

sentences.english: Sometimes I looked out of the window at the grey November afternoon, and saw the rain pouring down on the leafless garden.
sentences.chinese: 月的午後天氣陰沉，大雨傾瀉在禿枝枯葉的花園裏。

sentences.english: Words could once again flow from his mind to the page.
sentences.chinese: 心中的詞句又得以傾瀉於紙頁之上了。

sentences.english: Genuine love and affection poured in from all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 人們對他真切的喜愛和情感從全國各地傾瀉而來。

sentences.english: Moon, pour China, long life, thousands of miles of the moon were.
sentences.chinese: 皎皎明月，傾瀉神州，但願人長久，千里共嬋娟。

sentences.english: Liquid waste flows out from some factories into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 有些工廠將生產廢水向海中傾瀉。

sentences.english: The sun poured down its warmth upon the earth.
sentences.chinese: 陽光傾瀉大地把溫暖灑向人間。

sentences.english: Volcanic mudflows (lahars) poured down rivers and gullies around the intact flanks.
sentences.chinese: 火山泥石流傾瀉到殘留山體周圍的河流和溪谷之中。

sentences.english: Hundreds of US warp; anes are raining bombs on Iraqi targets.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的美軍戰機把炸彈傾瀉到伊拉克目標上。

sentences.english: Rain came pouring through the ceiling and windows and the wind was 1)howling outside.
sentences.chinese: 大雨從天花板和窗戶傾瀉而入，外面狂風怒號。

definition: lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
